item.title: Renew DHCP Lease on Ubuntu VM After Moving Between Wireless Networks
item.description: TL;DR sudo dhclient -r [eth0] && sudo dhclient [eth0] I add that command as an alias to my ~/.bashrc file alias resetdhcp='sudo …
